content:
Aathmaave! Nee sthuthiyekkaall
Nidrayeyente snehippoo?
Vyarththhatha nirayum mohangallilentinu kashdam-muzhukunnu.
Unarukenikkuka paaduka nee
Sarvvaadheesham! The sthothram.

Anuthaapavasaramithuthanne
Kaalavillambam koodaathe
Neethiviheenatha nishshesham
Nikhilarumorupol vediyatte
Pizhapol pakaram veettaruthe-
Sarvvaadheeshaa........

Naathhan nokkave virakondu
Dhara, maanavar than dushdathayaal
Dharmmakshayamereedukayaa-
Lillaki dharathannaadhaaram
Pizhapol pakaram veettaruthe-
Sarvvaadheeshaa…

Paapi nashikkanamennothiya
Daaveedu paapam cheythappoll
En kartthaavaamudayone!
Kaniyanamennodennothi
Pizhapol pakaram veettaruthe
Sarvvaadheeshaa......

Ebraayanteyezhutthum padi
Mrthi nyangallkkenneratthe
Nnaaninuvayile shishuvrndam
Janakajanatthodaaraanyu
Pizhapol pakaram cheyyaruthe-
Sarvvaadheeshaa......

Mrtharaam thaathasahodarar than
Pizhakallashesham pokkaname
Avarude perukallezhuthaname nin
Raajyasajeeva granthhatthil
Nin mahimodaya divasatthil
Nin valamaayavar nilkkenam.

Ekathvatthil thrithvavuma-
Ngekathvam thrithvatthilumaayu
Pithyasuthaparishuddhaathmaavaam
Sathai്yakeshannaayu sthothram
Sathatham thalkrpa nammudemel
Undaakattennannekkum.

Mariyaamin chihnam-saakshyatthin petti
Ninmohanaroopam-nibiyanmaarezhuthi
Oodullllorariyaa-nedaayu sookshichu
/taa noothanakalasham nin saadrshyam thaan
Svaadekum lavanam-polaayu nin soonu
Mudivaarnnoru lokam-avanaaluyir nedi

Udayon naathhaa!-marthyathaye nin daivathvam
Praapicheedaan-ghoshamirangumpoll
Shlomo nalki gabriyel sandeshatthin
Vitthu vithachaan-mariyaammin kaathil
Ponnaan shlomo-naathhan ninkoode udayam
Cheyyum ninnil-rakshakanaameesho
Haaleluyyaa aa raajaavin raajyatthi-
Nnillavasaanam-paartthaalorunaallum.

Chonnaall mariyaam mashihaaye prasavichappoll
Peretheki ninne villikkendu
Shishuvennaakaa neeyettam pauraanikanaam
Aayushmaanennaakaa nee paithal
Thaathodithamaayu lokatthinnolli nalkiyathaam
Kathirennevam ninne villikkum nyaan
Haaleluyyaa nin kathirinnudayam dhanyam
Nin prekshakanaa-matthaathan vandyan.

Dhanye! Nin praarththhana mevatte nyangallodonni-
Charththhana kettittekeedatte punyam naathhan.

Navyamathaakum jeevanperum nauke! Shlommo
Vaanavaraajan meviya raajaalayame!Shlomo
Neettiya chengkol paaniyilentum thoppe! Shlommo
Hantarahasyam kaatthoru vaasasthhalame! Shlomo.

Yogyathakoodum sumukheemaniyaam baale! Shlommo
Poorushabandham theendaattholle kanye! Shlommo
Lokarkkellaam vishramamekum thuraye! Shlomo
Vankazhukanthan dhaathri maadapraave! Shlomo.

Ompathumaasam ninneyettoll than praarththhanayaal
Daivaathmajane! Kopatthin dandozhivaakkenam.

Pantiruthoonukalli-dharaye thaangunnu
Pantirumaasangall-aandinmakudangall
Pantranduravullavaay-aa sheemon deshe
/tpantiru shleehanmaar vachanam ghoshichu
Vaanilumoozhiyilum-naanaa dishakallilum
Thalpraarththhana nyangall-kkabhayam sangketham.

Udayon naathhaa!-deepthiyezhum deepam pole
Lokarkkidayil-shleehamaar chennu
Aakelkkarusaa-ykkadimappettoru jaathikalle
Sanmaargatthin-shishyanmaaraakki
Vishvaasatthaal -thrithvatthin thirunaamatthil
Snaanam poondaar nairmmaalyam nedi.

Aa sahadenmaar engane vidhiye neritte-
Nnaaranabhoovil chennu nireekshichen
Meyyeriyumpoll-amgam chhedicheriyumpoll
Akame modam manamathilaahlaadam
Ulghoshichaar-ninperkkaayu mrthiyelkkunnu
Eesho! Naathhaa!-rakshicheedaname.

Naathhaa! Nin shleehanmaar than
Praarththhanayaal krpa cheyyaname
Thal praarththhanayaal yaachanayaal
Anpaathmaakkallilundaaka.

Nererum kunyaadukallaam
Shleehanmaar medayiletthi
Thaathaavin vaagdaanamathaa-
Maathmeeyam varamaarjippaan.

Prekshitharodothi sabhayaall
Deepthiyenikkeki ningall
Raajakumaarikkoppam nyaan
Maanyasthhaanam praapichu.

Naathhaa! Nin shleehanmaar than
Praarththhanayaal krpa cheyyaname
Thonnaname thal praarththhanayaal
Anpaathmaakkallilen naathhaa!

Yeshu! Thaathasuthaa! Thaangaayu nilkkaname
Yeshu! Mariyasuthaa! Sharanam nalkaname
Yeshu! Balameki paalicheedaname
/tyeshu! Saatthaane maayicheedaname.
Yeshu! Pokkaname-kadavum paapamathum
Yeshu! Vidhinaallil-kanivundaakaname

Pethgomo-naathhanazhikkum bandhithare-haa
Raavil keeppaa thadavinnum viduthal-praapichu
Raavil paulosshleehaayude kaicha-ngala veenu
Raaviltthanne paapatthin-bandhanavum chhedikkenam.

Raavil vanatthil yaakkobinu thaaram-dyuthi chithari
Raavil theetthoonisraayelinnaay-prabha chinti
Ninneyaaraadhipporil-raavil thaan prabha chintenam.

Vaanavar thanneeshaa!-maanavar thangathiye!
Ee shushrooshayeyettaardratha thonnenam.

Haa! Maartthommaa! Nin dukrono hrdyam
Kusumavibhooshithaneesonaam-maasam pole
Nisaan malarukall pol-nin smrthi modakaram
Nyangallkkennum nin praarththhana-thunayaakatte.

Maartthommaa! Ninne prasavicholl dhanya
Edanil natta manoharamaam-tharuvallo nee
Deenanmaarkkuthakum-phalamekunnoree
Tharuvin verukalleedharayil thala svargatthil.

Eppiskoppanmaare! Nyangallkkaayu praarththhippin
Naathhan nyangallkkekeedatte paapavimukthi.

Melppattakkaar sheemonkeeppaa chonnathupole
Vishvaasatthe tharkkam koodaathupadeshichu.
Aachaaryanmaar gurunaathhanmaareppin chennor
Shleehanmaar than maargam thannil sthhiramaayu neengi.

Aarkkunnevam sabha nyaanettam marddanamelppu
Puthrashleehanmaare! Enperkkaayu praarththhippin
Daivathanoojan preshakasavidham praapichappoll
Sheshippichaan vankottakallaayu ningalleyennil.

Ningalluyartthum praarththhanayaalangudayon naathhan
Aashrithareennum kopatthin dandozhivaakkatte.
